name: Waball
description:
Don't fall into the water! How far can you go? Tap the screen to change the ball's direction. Follow the maze run path. Stay on the path and zigzag as long as you can but don't fall into the water! WaBall is a fun and addictive endless runner game. React quickly and challenge yourself! Be careful not to fall!
How to play:
- Tap to change direction.
- Stay on path.
Features:
- Awesome graphics
- A good gameplay.
